trans-unit.source: Represents a class that can read and write key identifiers, key identifier clauses, and security tokens.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma classe que pode ler e escrever identificadores de chaves, cláusulas do identificador da chave e tokens de segurança.

trans-unit.source: Use the SecurityTokenSerializer class to read and write <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken> classes as XML.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar a classe de SecurityTokenSerializer para ler e escrever <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause>, e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken>classes como XML.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier>

trans-unit.source: The SecurityTokenSerializer class has methods to determine whether this class can read and write these entities and to actually read and write them.
trans-unit.target: A classe de SecurityTokenSerializer tem métodos para determinar se esta classe pode ler e escrever estas entidades e para, efetivamente, ler e escrevê-las.

trans-unit.source: For security tokens, these methods are <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadToken%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteToken%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadToken%2A>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.WriteToken%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para os tokens de segurança, estes métodos são <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadToken%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteToken%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadToken%2A>e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.WriteToken%2A>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.WriteToken%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadToken%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteToken%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this serializer can read the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""></xref> element referred to by the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: Determina se este serializador pode ler o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""> </xref> elemento referenciado pelo leitor de XML especificado.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.
trans-unit.target: Classes que derivam de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer>classe tem de substituir o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The CanReadKeyIdentifier method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas de método CanReadKeyIdentifier o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%2A>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to read the key identifier.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>para ler o identificador da chave.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""></xref> XML element can be read; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Quando especificado <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""> </xref> elemento XML pode ser de leitura; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this serializer can read a clause in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""></xref> element referred to by the specified XML reader.
